rows.label: tlk70000034_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh weary travelers, surely you of all
people must know the meaning of a
bond that sweetens over time!

rows.label: tlk70000034_01_msg0002
rows.name:
You Drivers and Blades fight together
and with time your hearts and minds
become one. It's so beautiful!

rows.label: tlk70000034_01_msg0003
rows.name:
After all, a shared action is worth far
more than a thousand words could
ever express...

rows.label: tlk70000034_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Such a bond is only natural. But how
can I sweeten my bond with a woman
who does not believe in love?!

rows.label: tlk70000034_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, this sweet pain that pricks my
chest to stitch her name there in my
very flesh... Love is pain, my friends!
